Transcription.errorTitle: Oops! Something went wrong loading the transcript.
Transcription.errorDescription: Please try again later or reload the page.
Transcription.loadingText1: This process may take some time
Transcription.loadingText2: The longer the video, the longer it will take to transcribe
Transcription.loadingText3: How about a cup of coffee in the meantime?
Transcription.loadingText4: Take your time and watch the video above
